channel.title: Players that survived the impossible
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Players that survived the impossible" - Players that survived the impossible

item.title: Re: Players that survived the impossible
item.content:encoded: If you already have StI, then you get nothing for being in a village that blew up. Also it is not possible for an Immortal Realm to blow up (though the Kage can destroy the village by kicking out all villagers and then leaving).

item.title: Players that survived the impossible
item.content:encoded: hey, i was wondering i am a player that as the Survived the Impossible and if i join a new village and then that village blows up, what do i get? and its possible that a village that has a leader that is a kaiju be blown up again?
